string.text: There is a signal: save a stalker
I got SOS from a stalker on a farm ... I need to hurry and help him ...
Signal is: Find signals on the cordon
Plyush gave me a certain device. He said that it takes some signals all over the cordon. It is worth dealing with this ... you need to look for places where he can take something interesting.
Good start: talk to ash
We finally arrived at the cordon. I rested a little, I need to go and talk with ash, discuss the further plan.
Good start: go to the village with a root
Ashes wants to get Sidor's money. You need to go to the village and knock out money from it "by the roof."
Good start: talk to the root
We are in the village. We need to talk with the root.
Good start: talk to Sidorovich

In the village, newcomers are afraid of us. And right. Nefig of this greenery from this from underfoot. You need to knock out money from Sidor. This old dick knows how to work with his tongue, you must be more accurate in negotiations.
Good start: talk to the root
The negotiations are over. You need to communicate the root.
Good start: return to the ashes
It is necessary to inform Pepla about the results of negotiations.
Electro: Talk to the shepherd
Chaban wants to tell me something. Most likely about that flawless thing.
Electro: follow the bandit
The chaban seems to have understood how to open his garbage. You need to follow him.
Electro: wait
Just wait. Are you a fool?
Electro: Pass the shepherd to the fire
The shepherd was shocked. Apparently, part of the Electra anomaly was closed in this thing. Your mother ... he flew very much. Well, at least survived.
Sudden work: talk with Sidorovich
Sidorovich wants to offer me a job. Why would I? You need to be careful.
Sudden work: Leave the bunker
I listened to Sidorovich. You need to leave the bunker.
Debts: find out about the missionary
I suddenly remembered that I had come to the cordon to find a missionary. You need to try Sidorovich or Claw in the village.
Losses: Find newcomers from the village
Claw asked to find newcomers who left the village. They are not far away.
Losses: Return to claw
Beginners are found. True, only one. He killed his friend. Hmm. Well, okay, you need to inform the claw.
Payment: Pay claw 10 thousand
Claw will tell you about the missionary if I pay him 10 thousand money. Need to bring them them.
Debts: check the grave at night
Claw gave a tip to the grave, where every night in the interval from 22:00 to 3:00 there may be a missionary. You need to catch it at this time.
Debts: kill and search a stalker
It is necessary to kill and inspect the stalker.
Herbalist: Find grass in a cache
The missionary is sick with "landfill smallpox". You need to collect grass for medicine.
Herbalist: find a scarlet flower
The missionary is sick with "landfill smallpox". You need to collect a scarlet flower for the medicine.
Herbalist: talk to the guard
I collected everything for the medicine for the missionary. They need to be attributed to the pig farm.
Herbalist: search the security cache
The guard does not want to let me go ... I need to find him a booze. Helpen Herov, bitch. Okay, this is not very far away. I'm running away.
Herbalist: bring moonshine to the guard
The moonshine took. Can spit it? This guard annoys me.
Herbalist: transfer the grass to the doctor
I went to the farm. Now you need to transfer the grass to the doctor.
Herbalist: take a nap
You need to relax and wait until the missionary wakes up.
Escape: talk to the sleeve
What was it? Did I dream of that? We need to talk with the sleeve.
Escape: Find a missionary
The missionary fled ... bitch ... I will find him, whatever it costs me. This bastard will pay ...
Escape: jump into the bubble above the bridge
The miserable suggested that the missionary jumped into the bubble above the bridge. I am behind him.
Catacombs: talk to the military
In the PDA of a certain scientist, a laboratory is mentioned. What ... Apparently you have to ask for help from old friends.
Catacombs: Talk to Colonel
Old friends accepted me warmly. Maybe. I hope we agree with the colonel.
Catacombs: Help the military
The colonel agreed to take me to the laboratory. But you need to help three military from the advance.
Funny night: talk to the colonel
I helped everyone on a checkpoint. We need to talk to the colonel.
Funny night: drink for a bonfire
Before the operation, the military want to drink together. I would like to join them.
Funny night: Return to the Colonel
The booze went ... not bad. I feel great. We need to talk to the colonel.
Funny night: talk to the military
You need to talk with the guys and find out if they are ready to fly.
Funny night: sit in a helicopter
Everyone is ready. You need to go into a helicopter and fly out with everyone.
Sweet and fluffy: find a tablet

The stalker tape asked to find his graphic tablet and promised something interesting to me in return ... Where is it, damn it? The tape says that the tablet is somewhere in the southern part of the cordon. It makes no sense to look for the railway to the north.
Sweet and fluffy: Return the tablet
I found a tablet. It is necessary to return its tape.
Old friends: check the noise
After the door was opened, I heard some strange noise on the lower floor ... I need to check what is there.
Old friends: check the camp at night
In the PDA of the corpse, a certain camp is indicated, where he should meet "old friends." It is worth checking this place at night.
Tuk-knuck: talk with bright
Svetly said he found the key. And the newcomer in the village lost the key ... The puzzle in the head is folding, right?
Tuk-knuck: open the door in the village
I have the key. You need to open the door in the village.
TUK-NEK: to inspect the house
I'm inside. The door slammed shut behind me and does not open ... Okay, I need to inspect the house.
Tuk-knuck: give the book to a beginner
The house had a strange book. It is necessary to return her to a newcomer
Tuk-knuck: give a bright one of the artifacts

The newcomer gave two artifacts as a reward - Rubin and sapphire. Together they, alas, are just trinkets. It is necessary to give a bright one of the art so that they show their properties. Anyway, he promised him a share.
Dead Anarchist: Meet the leader of the Svobodov detachment
Freedom on the cordon? Something interesting. They seem to have a job for which they promised a good payment ...
Dead Anarchist: Meet the Seller "Snuff"
Someone orders "Snuff" with "Svobodovites". You need to meet with the seller and try to go to the customer through him.
Dead Anarchist: Kill the Party
The bastard is associated with the entire trade in "Snuff". It needs to be killed.
Dead Anarchist: Return to Sopov
It is necessary to convey to Sopov everything that I learned from the seller of "Snuff".
The color of blue eyes: inspect the place of glow
It is necessary to inspect the place where the dried one saw a glow at night.
Color of blue eyes: give the artifact to the dried
What was it? Did you teleport the artifact? It is necessary to show it to the dried.
Color of blue eyes: Find dried
The dried is gone. The artifact teleported him ... Bitch, it was obvious ... you need to find it.
Color of blue eyes: talk dried
The dried is saved. We need to discuss what happened to him.
You have debt: meet the debtor
Some stalker owed his brother. We must go and pick up the goldfish artifact.
You have a debt: check the debtor's cache
I feel that this hell has planned something. But what?
You have debt: kill mercenaries
You need to kill mercenaries.
You have debt: check the debtor
This asshole ambushed. As I understand it, it was not intended for me. You need to check if the pumpkin is in place.
You have debt: to search the body of the debtor
It seems to me that the pumpkin is deceiving me. I killed him. You need to search the body.
You have debt: return to the bandit
You need to return to the brother and talk about what happened.
Cerebusion: check the place where the newcomers were
The newcomer asked to inspect the place where he killed his friend.
Brainness: Find a refrigerator
What was it? I had a note in my backpack ... It seems that the continuation in the refrigerator in one of the cellars of the village of Novichkov. The code from the castle is 4145.
Brainness: to inspect the dungeon
The note says a certain meeting in the dungeon near the destroyed farm ... you need to go there.
Brainstorm: Return to the beginner

It was all the tricks of the controller ... it was worth guessing. But ... how could he control my consciousness and the consciousness of that beginner from such a distance? Not particularly clear ...
Oh no, measurements!: Talk to the scientist
I decided to work on Sidorovich. The first task is to protect the scientist while he makes some measurements or like that.
Oh no, measurements!: Protect the scientist
I decided to work on Sidorovich. The first task is to protect the scientist while he makes some measurements or like that.
Oh yes, no measurement?: Tell Sidorovich about what happened
The scientist is gone ... We need to tell Sidorovich about this.
Fresh blood: meet a beginner
A newcomer came to the zone. You need to meet it and spend it to the village.
Fresh blood: to spend a newcomer to the village
A newcomer came to the zone. It is necessary to spend to the village.
Fresh blood: Kill dogs
Chiens came across on the way. We need to kill them.
Fresh blood: talk to a newcomer
The beginner got up and considers something. You need to find out what he saw there.
Fresh Blood: Kill the Boar
Suddenly a boar appeared. You need to kill him.
Fresh blood: talk to a newcomer
The wild boar is dead. We are already near the village. You need to bring a beginner to her.
Fresh blood: tell Sidorovich about the situation
The newcomer just escaped! Frightened the boar! And how many ambitions there were ... There are no words - only emotions. You need to tell Sidorovich.
Here people e ...: inspect the basement
I made my way through the barricades in the basement of the village of Novichkov. You need to inspect it.
Signal is: meet unknown
I caught some signal. It seems that someone just came to the house opposite the farm. In the same place where I found Plush. You need to meet them.
There is a signal: talk to the leader of the mercenaries
I came to the mercenaries. You need to find out what they are doing here.
Signal is: Return to Plush
I was cut down. Things are in place, which is surprising. It is a pity that now I do not know what they are plotting.
Eternal torment: find a gun
The military left a gun in the middle of the minefield. How?! Don't know. It should be at the fallen tree at the fence. It is necessary to carefully pick it up.
Eternal torment: Return the gun
I found a gun. We must get out of the field and give the military gun.
Trauman: Find a frying on a checkpoint
The military somewhere lost a lighter on a checkpoint. You need to find it. Oh God ...
Grass: Return the lighter
I found a lighter. And a hundred years have not passed ...
The diary of the future: find the lost military
The military went crazy and went to the elevator. You need to find it.
The diary of the future: kill the chimera
Chimères! You need to kill her.
Diary of the future: talk to the military
The chimera is dead. We need to talk to the military.
The diary of the future: report to the military on the implementation
The military is saved. I must say that you need to go.
Eternal torment: talk to flour
We need to talk to the flour.
Grass: talk to Travin
We need to talk with Travin.
The diary of the future: talk to the dodger
We need to talk with the dump.
Many dreams: check Sidorovich
Sidor did not get in touch for a long time. You need to check it.
Many dreams of many: talk with a claw
There is no Sidorovich. We need to ask the claw where he was gone.
Fear of the unknown: go through catacombs
You need to make your way through the catacombs to the laboratory.
Fear of the unknown: find a way to open the door
You need to make your way through the catacombs to the laboratory.
Fear of the unknown: pick up notes
You need to choose the notes.
Fear of the unknown: Leave the catacombs
You need to leave the catacombs by readiness.
Moment of the reckoning: kill everyone
It is necessary to kill everyone who stands in their way.
Moment of reckoning: Find a missionary
I will kill him.
Moment of the reckoning: kill a missionary
Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life.
Moment of the reckoning: Kill "Quasar"
Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life. Life.
